TopicTitle: Avg's Stock Redux v0.01 - Mk2LanderCan with foil top and simplified wing retextures!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, Avera9eJoe here. This is the very first mod/texture/ANYTHING I've ever passed around so please be nice ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

*Have your wanted moar gold foil in your stock craft? Ever thought there was something missing in your stock game? Well I'm here to tell you that NOW there is a solution!*

**Avg's Stock Redux v0.01**

Brought to you by HafCo.

[DOWNLOAD (Dropbox)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/wonp45rt0jqrp06/Avg%27s%20Stock%20Redux%20v0.01.zip?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/cE5It)

**Planned**(if people like this)**:**

- Re-texture heat shield (maybe)

- Convert all textures to .DDS once 1.0 drops

- Editing and matching miss-colored stock textures ([example](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96384-The-MK2-parts-are-in-like-50-shades-of-gray-white!-They-don-t-all-match!))

**Completed:**

- **Retextured Mk2LanderCan**

- Added gold foil texture and normal map to roof

- Cleaned up dents/scratches

- darkened window frame

- Re-positioned outer grating for friendlier attach placement

- Added new dark panel w/ Super Cool warning sign

- Added red line under grating

- **Retextured wings**

- removed plating on top of plating on top of plating!

- Blended/removed scratch marks

- Simplified ailerons/elevons

I hope you guys like the re-textures!

- Avera9eJoe OUT.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T02:26:31Z" title="04/27/2015 02:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**
Nifty! You'll probably need a license picked out for the forum rules, though.

> 
> - Convert all textures to .DDS once 1.0 drops
> 
> -

This has already been confirmed for 1.0 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Nifty! You'll probably need a license picked out for the forum rules, though.

I included one in the download. Does it need to be posted here as well?

> 
> This has already been confirmed for 1.0 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yep! And that's why I'll need to convert them. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I like your lander can texture. It looks like a part from Chaka.
Very nice! I like the lander can!

Thank you guys ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). Again this is the very first released "mod" of any sort I'd done. I've made new textures for MC when I played but I never shared them.

Oh! I looked at Chaka and those parts are very pretty. Thanks for the complement!

I love the wings! The lander can much better than the stock one, but I use Ven's revamp. I guess I'll work on getting these two to cooperate when 1.0 comes tomorrow.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T03:25:38Z" title="04/27/2015 03:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by RyanRising**
The lander can looks good. I like it!

> 
> I love the wings! The lander can much better than the stock one, but I use Ven's revamp. I guess I'll work on getting these two to cooperate when 1.0 comes tomorrow.

I'm a big fan of Ven's textures! The only thing I don't like about them is that he redesigned the models - meaning you're *technically* building with attach nodes in non-stock places. These are purely redesigning the textures so the attach nodes aren't changed at all. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
